definition: surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

pinyin: Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1

sentences.english: The discussions of ideology made by Hirst, a British Althusserianist, mainly revolve around Althosser.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯特對意識形態的論述，主要考察的是阿爾都塞。

sentences.english: His cognitive way contains not only rationalities but also limitations.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾都塞的認識方法有合理性也有侷限性。

sentences.english: Althusser is one of the leading representations of Structuralistic Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾都塞是結構主義的馬克思主義的主要代表之一。
